title: PERF: O(n²) duplicate detection in basis validation - should be O(n)
description:
File: src/basis/warm.c lines 92-96 and 145-152

Issue: Basis validation uses nested loop for duplicate detection, resulting in O(n²) complexity. This is inefficient for large basis sizes.

Performance Impact: Significant slowdown for warm starting with large bases.

Fix: Use boolean seen[] array instead of nested loop to achieve O(n) complexity.

title: M1.5: Stub Simplex Entry
description:
## Overview
Stub cxf_solve_lp() for tracer bullet.

## File
src/simplex/solve_lp_stub.c

## Behavior for Tracer Bullet
Handle trivial 1-variable unconstrained LP:
1. Set solution to lower bound (or upper if obj < 0)
2. Compute obj_val = obj_coeff * solution
3. Set status = CXF_OPTIMAL

## Function
- cxf_solve_lp(): Entry point for simplex algorithm

## Spec
docs/specs/functions/simplex/cxf_solve_lp.md

## Target Size
~100 LOC

title: M1.8: Tracer Bullet Benchmark
description:
## Overview
Benchmark the tracer bullet to establish baseline performance.

## File
benchmarks/bench_tracer.c

## Benchmark Steps
1. Run 10,000 iterations of:
   - Create env
   - Create model
   - Add variable
   - Optimize
   - Free model
   - Free env
2. Measure total time
3. Report microseconds per iteration

## Performance Target
< 1ms per iteration (< 1000 us/iteration)

## Target Size
~50 LOC

title: M1.2: Stub CxfModel Structure
description:
## Overview
Implement CxfModel structure and stub model functions.

## Files
- include/convexfeld/cxf_model.h
- src/api/model_stub.c

## CxfModel Fields
- magic (uint32_t): Magic number for validation
- env (CxfEnv*): Pointer to parent environment
- name (char*): Model name
- num_vars (int): Number of variables
- num_constrs (int): Number of constraints
- obj_coeffs (double*): Objective coefficients
- lb (double*): Variable lower bounds
- ub (double*): Variable upper bounds
- solution (double*): Solution values
- status (int): Optimization status
- obj_val (double): Objective value

## Functions to Stub
- cxf_newmodel(): Create new model
- cxf_freemodel(): Destroy model
- cxf_addvar(): Add variable to model

## Spec
docs/specs/structures/cxf_model.md

## Target Size
~120 LOC

title: FIX: model->matrix never allocated in cxf_newmodel() - will crash
description:
File: src/api/model.c

Issue: The matrix field in the model struct is never allocated in cxf_newmodel(). This will cause a crash when any real LP problem is solved.

Fix: Add `model->matrix = cxf_sparse_create(0, 0);` in cxf_newmodel() to initialize the matrix field.

title: M1.3: Stub SparseMatrix Structure
description:
## Overview
Define SparseMatrix structure using CSC (Compressed Sparse Column) format.

## Files
- include/convexfeld/cxf_matrix.h
- src/matrix/sparse_stub.c

## SparseMatrix Fields (CSC Format)
- num_rows (int): Number of rows
- num_cols (int): Number of columns
- nnz (int): Number of non-zeros
- col_ptr (int*): Column pointers array
- row_idx (int*): Row indices array
- values (double*): Non-zero values
- Optional CSR fields for dual representation

## Spec
docs/specs/structures/sparse_matrix.md

## Target Size
~80 LOC

- obj* = 0

title: FIX: cxf_solve_lp stub returns WRONG answers - claims success but ignores constraints
description:
File: src/simplex/solve_lp_stub.c

Issue: The stub implementation of cxf_solve_lp returns OPTIMAL status with wrong/placeholder values. This causes incorrect results when the stub is used instead of the real solver.

Expected Behavior: Should return CXF_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED to indicate the function is not yet implemented.

Fix: Return CXF_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED instead of wrong OPTIMAL status.

title: M1.4: Stub API Functions
description:
## Overview
Minimal stubs for tracer bullet API functions.

## File
src/api/api_stub.c

## Functions to Stub
- cxf_loadenv: Create environment
- cxf_freeenv: Destroy environment
- cxf_newmodel: Create model
- cxf_freemodel: Destroy model
- cxf_addvar: Add variable
- cxf_optimize: Run optimization (calls simplex stub)
- cxf_getintattr: Get integer attribute
- cxf_getdblattr: Get double attribute

## Spec
docs/specs/modules/17_model_api.md

## Target Size
~150 LOC

title: Remove unnecessary sqrt in hot loop - steepest edge pricing
description: File: src/pricing/steepest.c line 102. Compare squared values instead of taking sqrt for performance optimization in hot code path

title: CRITICAL: Thread-safety violation - global variable g_reduced_costs in qsort comparison
description:
File: src/pricing/candidates.c lines 32-42

Issue: Global variable g_reduced_costs is used in the qsort comparison function. This is not thread-safe and will cause race conditions when multiple threads use the pricing module concurrently.

Risk: Data corruption and incorrect results in multi-threaded execution.

Fix: Use qsort_r (the reentrant version) or implement a custom sort function that accepts the g_reduced_costs array as a context parameter.

title: M1.1: Stub CxfEnv Structure
description:
## Overview
Implement CxfEnv structure and stub environment functions.

## Files
- include/convexfeld/cxf_env.h
- src/api/env_stub.c

## CxfEnv Fields
- magic (uint32_t): 0xC0FEFE1D for validation
- active (int): 1 if environment is active
- error_buffer (char[512]): Last error message
- feasibility_tol (double): Feasibility tolerance
- optimality_tol (double): Optimality tolerance
- infinity (double): Value representing infinity

## Functions to Stub
- cxf_loadenv(): Create and initialize environment
- cxf_freeenv(): Destroy environment

## Spec
docs/specs/structures/cxf_env.md

## Target Size
~100 LOC
